title: Role of women in military WWI - WWII

content.description:
Refer to the image below.

Photo of a unit of the Mocidade Portuguesa Feminina (Portuguese Women’s Youth Organization) in front of a monument to Henry the Navigator, Lisbon, late 1930s.

Z1 Collection / Alamy
content.question: The organization in the image is best understood as a continuation of which of the following?

choices.label: The political and military mobilization of women during the First World War
The success of the women’s suffrage movement
The growth of new concepts of marriage and motherhood

content.answer: The political and military mobilization of women during the First World War

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
